text: Leroy "Goldy" Goldsworthy (October 18, 1908 â€“ March 16, 1980) was an American ice hockey player. He played 11 seasons in the NHL. Goldsworthy won the Stanley Cup while a member of the Chicago Black Hawks in 1934.
